channel.title: "Heartfelt" (crap name, i know) Vector tshirt designs
channel.description:
I decided to make some more tshirt designs. I have not yet decided where to place the design on a shirt exactly yet, but I made many different colored versions of it for different shirts. (both for black and white shirts).
Black Shirt Previews [img]http://fc01.deviantart.com/fs24/f/2007/325/e/d/BlackShirt_Prevs_by_EmpyreDesigns.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.google.com]Large Detailed View[/url] Disabled until later today
White Shirt Previews [img]http://fc03.deviantart.com/fs23/f/2007/325/3/5/WhiteShirt_Prevs_by_EmpyreDesigns.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.google.com]]Large Detailed View[/url] Disabled until later today
Comments, suggestion, and criticism are welcome. :)

item.title: "Heartfelt" (crap name, i know) Vector tshirt designs
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=".Flair, post:25, topic:159630"][quote author=brownsymcard link=topic=217357.msg1901780#msg1901780 date=1196156241]

[ img ]http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/5341/idkmybffjilljh3.png[/img]

Fail

Mind you I said that the placement of it is undecided still. I never would slap it onto the dead center of a shirt.

I would lean towards coming from under the right sleeve, or flipping/rotating it so it comes down from the left shoulder.
[/quote]

It needs to be smaller on the shirt, it was supposed to be more towards the left shoulder.[/quote]

I agree should be smaller…

Read full topic

item.title: "Heartfelt" (crap name, i know) Vector tshirt designs
item.dc:creator: @brownsymcard brownsymcard
item.description:
@brownsymcard wrote:

Thanks for all the compliments people :).

And exps, your probably right on the whole watermark thing, i had to post these in a hurry so I ignored it. I’ve already posted them at all of the well known graphic communities, so if someone does try to rip it, they will be caught, or only praised by a few kids on a small forum.

Read full topic
item.source: "Heartfelt" (crap name, i know) Vector tshirt designs

item.title: "Heartfelt" (crap name, i know) Vector tshirt designs
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

If I were you, I’d make a nice watermark for those. It could be somewhere discrete if you want, like maybe in some scan-lines, but at least put them somewhere.
This is just waiting to be ripped, and I would not like to see something like this be accredited to anybody but the true owner

Read full topic
